content:
@OptionalParam is no more supported in @Operation method.
When I use @OperationParam it doesn't have chainWhitelist attribute.
So I can no more use this :

@OperationParam(name = Encounter.SP_PATIENT, chainWhitelist = {"", Patient.SP_IDENTIFIER, Patient.SP_FAMILY, Patient.SP_GENDER, Patient.SP_BIRTHDATE, Patient.SP_DECEASED, Patient.SP_DEATH_DATE}) ReferenceAndListParam thePatient,
Can anyone tell me what is the equivalent of chainWhitelist in @Operation method in the hapi fhir v5.5.1 please ?
this is a question for #hapi
